GREETING_NEW_LEAD.description: First greeting for new leads to collect name
GREETING_NEW_LEAD.english:
Aoa!
I am Tanveer Awan from ICT.

May I know your name?

Aoa!
Main Tanveer Awan hun ICT se.

Good to hear from you again.

Last time we discussed {course_name}. How can I help you?

Pichli dafa hum ne {course_name} ke bare mein baat ki thi. Kya main ap ki madad kar sakta hun?

Please save my number as "ICT Tanveer" for future use.

Which course are you interested in?

1- Certified Tax Advisor (CTA)
2- Advance Taxation & Litigations
3- USA Taxation Course
4- UAE Taxation Course
5- UK Taxation Course
6- Saudi Taxation Course
7- Company Secretary Course
8- Sales Tax Mastery Course
9- Import & Export Course
10- LLC Formation Course
11- Canadian Taxation Course
12- Pakistan Stock Exchange Course

What is your education background?

1- Matric/Intermediate
2- OLevel/Alevel
3- Bachelors
